description: The Yemen tree aloe (Aloe sabaea) is an amazing plant species, due to its unique and striking appearance. With thick, curved, blue-green leaves and vibrant orange flowers, the Yemen tree aloe stands out amongst the crowd. It is known to be hardy and drought-tolerant, making it a resilient choice for your garden! The thick leaves are also known to be very effective in collecting, storing and reusing water, making it a great eco-friendly choice. Plus if youâ€™re looking for something special that will draw attention to your garden, the Yemen tree aloe will do just that!
